pages.text: $(l)Brok and Sindri$(), also known as the Huldra Brothers, are legendary blacksmiths renowned throughout the realms for their unparalleled craftsmanship. $(br2)These master artisans are responsible for forging some of the most powerful and iconic weapons and artifacts in all Nine Realms and are hence your key to obtaining them. $(br2)The Huldra Brothers are not only skilled in the art of forging but also possess an unmatched knowledge of processing $(l:resources)Divine Relics Ores$(). Their expertise ensures that these rare materials are processed with maximum efficiency, that is unreachable for a mere player. $(br2)$(l)Restocking:$() Ever industrious, the Huldra Brothers restock their inventory every half an hour, ensuring that their customers always have access to the best equipment and upgrades available.
Can only be found in their rather rare occurring $(l:structures/brok_and_sindri_shop)Shops$()
